apis.name: Project iterations API
apis.description: As of GitLab 13.5, we don’t have project-level iterations, but you can use this endpoint to fetch the iterations of the project’s ancestor groups.

apis.name: List project iterations
apis.description: Returns a list of project iterations.

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: ‘Return opened, upcoming, current (previously started), closed, or all iterations. Filtering by started state is deprecated starting with 14.1, please use current instead.’

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Return only iterations with a title matching the provided string.

attributes.name: include_ancestors
attributes.description: Include iterations from parent group and its ancestors. Defaults to true.
